# Allah ligatures appears in some fonts with an Alef, and without one in
# others. Also, a Shadda and a superscript Alef may or may not trigger it or
# appear in it. The final Heh is also sometimes Heh Goal-shaped
#FDF2; 0644 0644 0647
FDF2; 0627 0644 0644 0647
#FDF2; 0644 0644 06C1
FDF2; 0627 0644 0644 06C1

FDF2; 0627 0644 0644 0651 0670 0647
#FDF2; 0644 0644 0651 0670 06C1
